section.title: macOS Installation
section.p:
To install on macOS, follow these steps:
Download the macOS installation package ().
[Optional] Validate the integrity of the downloaded file by checking it against the MD5 sum published on the download page.
Double-click the disk image file to mount it.
Drag/Copy the folder to your /Applications folder (or another location if you wish).If you receive a warning that an installation folder already exists in the Applications folder, do not attempt to merge the two installations. Instead, move the old installation folder to the trash bin before installing the application. If you are prompted to Replace the old folder, cancel the installation, move the old folder to the trash bin, and restart the installation process.Do not copy the files/folders from within the folder (always copy the folder itself), otherwise you will omit invisible files/folders and the application may no longer start.
Start , using one of the following methods:
Double-click Oxygen XML Editor.appOxygen XML Author.appOxygen XML Developer.appOxygen JSON Editor.appSyncro SVN Client.app.
Run sh oxygen.shsh oxygenAuthor.shsh oxygenDeveloper.shsh oxygenJSONEditor.shsh syncroSVNClient.sh in the command-line interface.
To license your copy of , go to Help Register to enter your license key.

section.title: macOS Unattended Installation
section.p:
To install on macOS in unattended mode, follow these steps:
Download the macOS installation package ().
Mount the file in the command line.hdiutil attach oxygen-openjdk.dmghdiutil attach oxygenAuthor-openjdk.dmg|oxygenAuthor.dmg|oxygenDeveloper.dmghdiutil attach oxygenDeveloper-openjdk.dmg|oxygenAuthor.dmg|oxygenDeveloper.dmghdiutil attach oxygenJSONEditor-openjdk.dmg|oxygenAuthor.dmg|oxygenDeveloper.dmg
Copy the oxygen folder for the particular version from the mounted volume to the Applications folder (or another folder where you want to install it), as in the following example:
cp -aR "/Volumes/Oxygen XML Editor /Oxygen XML Editor" /Applications/|
cp -aR "/Volumes/Oxygen XML Author /Oxygen XML Author" /Applications/|
cp -aR "/Volumes/Oxygen XML Developer /Oxygen XML Developer" /Applications/|
cp -aR "/Volumes/Oxygen JSON Editor /Oxygen JSON Editor" /Applications/|
Eject the mounted disc image:
hdiutil detach "/Volumes/Oxygen XML Editor "|
hdiutil detach "/Volumes/Oxygen XML Author "|
hdiutil detach "/Volumes/Oxygen XML Developer "|
hdiutil detach "/Volumes/Oxygen JSON Editor "|
